title: Chroma Champion Thresh
body:
Hey guys, i think the champion thresh skin is super cool, but that also got me thinking how awesome it would be if they did a chroma pack for the skin. Mainly change the color of his flames/aura to pink green and orange with maybe a change in his armor as well.

Soft Pink Armor (#f2a0e6) with Vivid Pink Flames (#c500b3) 
White Armor with Vivid Green Flames (#29a952)
Black or Yellow Armor with Standard Flames 

{{champion:412}}
Even if they just made a chroma for his classic skin and changed the green option to blue that would be cool too :D

replies.body: There is already a white and green skin for thresh SSW thresh but it has a blue as well but yeh. I wouldn't mind a Reverse thresh has the black parts as green and the flames as black xD…
That would honestly look so bad.
But there already two blue skins.
